      • ButtonElement

        public ButtonElement(int x,
                     int y,
                     @Nonnull
                     java.lang.String text,
                     @Nullable
                     java.util.function.Consumer<org.bukkit.entity.Player> callback)
        Constructs a ButtonElement with the provided callback. Will always resend the menu after the button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        text - the text
        callback - the callback to be called when the button is clicked.

      • ButtonElement

        public ButtonElement(int x,
                     int y,
                     @Nonnull
                     java.lang.String text,
                     @Nullable
                     java.util.function.Function<org.bukkit.entity.Player,java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Constructs a ButtonElement with the provided callback.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        text - the text
        callback - the callback to be called when the button is clicked. Should return true to automatically resend the menu.
